body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Walter Wright and the customer's name is Jacqueline Foster.  The conversation is about a random business (a Pawn Shop ) and is a conversation about privacy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Walter Wright, and I am with Quick Cash Pawn. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Walter, I'm Jacqueline Foster. I have some questions about your privacy policies.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for reaching out, Jacqueline. We take privacy very seriously at Quick Cash Pawn. What specific questions do you have?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I want to know what personal information you collect when I sell items.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great question! When you sell items to us, we typically collect your full name and address. May I ask for your address, Jacqueline?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one two three Maple Street.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! Additionally, we also ask for your phone number for contact purposes. Could you provide that as well?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course! It’s five five five two three four one two three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Jacqueline. Rest assured, your information is kept confidential and secure within our system.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate that. It makes me feel more comfortable doing business with you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Jacqueline! Thank you for your time today, and if you have any further questions, don't hesitate to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
